name: The Thrift Shoppe of Second Hand Dreams
name_original: The Thrift Shoppe of Second Hand Dreams
description:
Playable in the window above: use arrow keys or WASD to move. The game starts when you press a key. Move into objects to learn more about them.

Recently I had a strange idea-what if you could go to a thrift shop for other peoples' dreams? Naturally I then went on to make this idea come to life in Bitsy.
